Compares two polymorphic allocators. Two polymorphic allocators compare equal if their underlying memory resource compares equal.

@1@ Returns {{c|1=*lhs.resource() == *rhs.resource()}}.
@2@ Same as {{v|1}}, allowing conversion to {{tt|polymorphic_allocator}}.&lt;br&gt;{{cpp/hidden_friend|std::pmr::polymorphic_allocator}}
@3@ Returns {{c|1=!(lhs == rhs)}}.
@4@ Same as {{v|3}}, allowing conversion to {{tt|polymorphic_allocator}}.&lt;br&gt;{{cpp/hidden_friend|std::pmr::polymorphic_allocator}}

{{rrev|since=c++20|
{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}
}}

{{par|lhs, rhs|polymorphic allocators to compare}}
{{par end}}
